import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button.component' import { addItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import './collection-item.styles.scss' const CollectionItem = ({id, name, price, imageUrl}) => { return

{name}

{price}

Add to cart
} export default CollectionItem
